page.title: 05CROSSWAYS INN
page.content: The {Crossways Inn}has been reopened now after 18 months. The owners went bankrupt and so they closed down.They couldn't get new owners and that's why it took 18 months for the pub to re-open. Everyone in{Folly Gate is very pleased. They get a lot of people in the pub since it has re-opened. The most popular drink is beer.They sell bar meals and also they sell cigarettes and crisps. They used to have a juke box.They have a Space Invader game and children are not allowed to play on it. They also have swings,slides and a climbing frame outside for the children to play on.They have picnic tables for all the customers to sit,drink and have a chat outside. The children are not allowed to sit at the bar or buy a drink.
